title: Denmark: [Paul Henningsen]
brief_description: A visual interpretation of the pattern and tempo of life in Denmark. Observes fishermen hauling in the catch; loading and unloading of cargo at the dock; farmers bringing their products to market and lighter side of life - holiday making and fun at the local carnival.
